attributes.action: Increase books at British Council Library for Residents of Chennai and create a e-book site for members of the club
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are avid readers of British Authored Books and have made careful use of british  books made available at the British Council Library in Chennai. We would like you to increase the number of technical engineering and science books available at the library. Also, it would be nice if the british council could put up technical e-books on the internet for download and browsing especially for those who pay the annual fees.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
